title.rendered: Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student For Windows | Digital Delivery | Activation Key and Download link by Email

content.rendered:
Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student comes with all the classic apps you need to get your work done at home or in your small business. It includes the 2019 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint. The software can be installed on a PC.
  • This is an outright purchase of Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student so you don’t have to worry about renewals.
  • You will receive the classic 2019 versions of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint.
  • The 2019 version of Excel comes with a variety of new chart types allowing you to display your data in different ways.
  • PowerPoint includes a new Zoom option which allows you to deliver non-linear presentations, seamlessly switching between slides.

excerpt.rendered:
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by WhatsApp or Write to us at: support@codesforever.com

its a Digital Download which means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.

No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you

This is a 100 % Original Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student Product Key 

The product key will activate the  full version of Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student Product Key 

It’s compatible with PCs running Windows 10 Only. This is Not a Bind Key

The Key will not bind With Microsoft Account.

The Microsoft Office 2019 Home & student  will activate the multilingual language version. Any language version is supported. For example English, Spanish, German, French ..
